column4: hello there. im trying to configure a 22inches lcd panel and i just got the 1680X1050 res working. But ive got some screen missing. Its like 4 or 5cm to the right and i cant use the monitors panel to bring it more to the right. Any ideas?
Look for auto config in your settings, that is how most of the lcd work
i did. but then i got the screen to like 30cm to the left
fixed.. i had setted the screen to 1650x1050 by hand. i had to use auto to make it work. Thanks anyway
